item.title: About
item.description: Hello! I’m a Designer/Developer based out of Clapiers, South of France. I have a huge passion for web design, front-end web development, and how it all comes together with good ol’ UX. What I’m capable of doing? Web design that works Not only can I paint a pretty picture, but I can make that pretty picture generate business. Whether It’s lead generation or ecommerce sales, I create designs tailored specifically for the business goals at hand.
